Jargon Term: You have improved significantly but will need to complete a 14 day course of antibiotics.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: Please take all medications as prescribed and keep all your doctors [**Name5 (PTitle) 4314**].
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: If you experience any chest pain, nausea, vominting, fevers, chills, low blood pressure, or any other symptom that concerns you, please seek medical attention.
